author: Jonny Chatfield
comment: Made a purchase through the app a month ago and have been left in tbe cold by Fancy and the vendor. No response to my email to either the vendor or the courier and Fancy do not have an easy means of contacting them. Out of pocket and very annoyed. Would not recommend making purchases through this app

author: Ayana McNair
comment: Addictive scrolling, but kinda buggy. Also, wish I could get back to where I was without starting from the very beginning. Nice, clean UX, though, so no regrets.

comment: Fun app

author: Vijai Sukhram

author: carl g
comment: Amazing prices awesome items. Too good to be true, mostly. That's cause most as not true. I purchased an item and waiting a very long time for it to arrive. It had not arrived I contacted support and provided a full refund. The app needs regulators or monitors to thoroughly filter the scam artists out. Good luck. Thanks for my refund, and friendly support.

author: pks Prashant
comment: This is a scam the product which cost 5000 on other apps the same exact product is above 10000 here. .. and the thing not stops after ordering product u will never get that product delivered and there is no customer care or number in this app to take our money back. ... It's a requst for Google please delete this app from play store it's a scam to take our money and giving no products it's 3 month now I didn't get my product n there is no option to comolain or get our money back. .... Plz plZ guyzzz don't waste your money you will not get your product delivered

author: Jorge Riveros
comment: A month passed and never received my order. Neither the app or the seller respond my emails or messages. SCAM!!!  That was my first review. It's fair to add some comments...   When I was trying to contact the seller they answered me almost a month later. (You can contact the seller through the website, though the app shouldn't restrict buyers from contacting sellers).  After two and a half months my shipment arrived, although I was expecting a retribution from the seller the item was in perfect conditions.  Hope this works for you.

author: chreeztyn guantia
comment: Fancy is Scam. Never share your link to your friends you will never get rewarded.Fancy Promise that when your friend signed up,you will earn credits,but it's a lie. 108 people signed up and placed their orders through my refferal link but i never get any credits from it. FANCY IS SCAM.I tried to call them but their hotline is always invalid and they never respond to my emails.
